subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Civil Rights
Anthems, National
lead_paragraph: When “The Star-Spangled Banner” and “God Bless America” are played at Yankee Stadium, chains are used to prevent fans from moving around in the stadium’s lower section.
snippet: When “The Star-Spangled Banner” and “God Bless America” are played at Yankee Stadium, chains are used to prevent fans from moving around in the stadium’s lower section.
